segments.text: Hello , I ’ d like a return to Xi ’ an please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . When do you want to travel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , no problem . What class of service would you like - soft sleeper or hard sleeper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is the soft sleeper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The soft sleeper costs 600RMB one way and the hard sleeper is 400RMB one way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I ’ ll take a return ticket on the soft sleeper please .
segments.speaker: S1
